column1: Food Consumer Marketing and Product Development with Work Experience (MSc)
column5: This work experience course prepares you for a career within the food sector, specialising in food product development, food consumer marketing or retailing roles.
column7: Our tuition fee for UK students starting full-time study in 2023/24 is £11,410 with work experience placement.  Please see the university website for further information on fees for this course.
